name: Keep Growing
description:
Grow faster! Every 10 seconds you will lose part of yourself, but no worries, eat the yellow pills and you will be fine !

Use WASD keys or arrows to move around.

Use teleporters to waste less time.

Dodge the flames and pikes or you'll lose a part of yourself!

The goal is to reach a size of 25! Good luck :)

Do not hesitate to give me your opinion on my game, it will allow me to improve!
